org.researchstack.backbone.storage.database

Interface AppDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseHelper, SqlCipherDatabaseHelper

    public interface AppDatabase
    Whatever database implementation you use should implement these methods for basic saving of TaskResult and StepResult. It also provides a method for setting the encryption key of the database, for encrypted databases (do nothing if your database is not encrypted).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaskResult loadLatestTaskResult(java.lang.String taskIdentifier)
      Loads the latest task result for the given task identifier.
      java.util.List<StepResult> loadStepResults(java.lang.String stepIdentifier)
      Returns a list of all StepResults for the given step identifier.
      java.util.List<TaskResult> loadTaskResults(java.lang.String taskIdentifier)
      Returns a list of all TaskResults for the given task identifier.
      void saveTaskResult(TaskResult result)
      Saves the TaskResult to the database, along with its child StepResults
      void setEncryptionKey(java.lang.String key)
      Sets the encryption key on the database.

    • Method Detail

      • saveTaskResult

        void saveTaskResult(TaskResult result)
        Saves the TaskResult to the database, along with its child StepResults
        Parameters:
        result - the task result to save

      • loadLatestTaskResult

        TaskResult loadLatestTaskResult(java.lang.String taskIdentifier)
        Loads the latest task result for the given task identifier.

        This can be used to see when the user last answered the survey, or to get their most recent answer to a survey question.

        Parameters:
        taskIdentifier - the task identifier
        Returns:
        the latest TaskResult for the given identifier, or none

      • loadTaskResults

        java.util.List<TaskResult> loadTaskResults(java.lang.String taskIdentifier)
        Returns a list of all TaskResults for the given task identifier.
        Parameters:
        taskIdentifier - the task identifier
        Returns:
        a list of all TaskResults for the given identifier

      • loadStepResults

        java.util.List<StepResult> loadStepResults(java.lang.String stepIdentifier)
        Returns a list of all StepResults for the given step identifier.
        Parameters:
        stepIdentifier - the step identifier
        Returns:
        a list of all StepResults for the given identifier

      • setEncryptionKey

        void setEncryptionKey(java.lang.String key)
        Sets the encryption key on the database. If your database doesn't support encryption, make this a no-op.
        Parameters:
        key - a string key to be used to encrypt the database
